scenario_text.value:
Hey, Takuma. Is there something up with this
window?
Hey Takuma, I can’t open it!
Not even with your strength, Agumon?
I’m gonna try to break the glass!

Hiyahhh!
No way! Not even my claws can break it?!

Hmm...well, no adults are around... Might as
well give it a shot.

I’ve always wanted to try something like
this...HNNNGH!
Whoa! Not even a chair will break it?!

It feels like the spiderwebs are absorbing
the impact. Is that even possible...?
What is this enemy we’re facing...?
